title: Drug Mixing and Transferring
author: Opentrons
description: This protocol allows you to add different combination of compounds from several 96-well plate to each well of a 24-well plate for mixing using a single-channel pipette. Each of these 24 wells will then be transferred to a clean 24-well plate. The compound source information and target locations are defined in a CSV file.
process:
Upload a CSV file containing information of compound source and target.
Download the protocol for the appropriate robot.
notes:
CSV files breakdown:
 Compound: name of compound
 Plate: the plate in which the compound is stored
 Well: the well of the plate in which the compound is stored
 A1, B1 ,,,, D6: volume of which the compound is to be transferred to each individual target well A1, B1 ,,,, D6

markdown.title: Drug Mixing and Transferring
markdown.author: [Opentrons](https://opentrons.com/)
markdown.description: This protocol allows you to add different combination of compounds from several 96-well plate to each well of a 24-well plate for mixing using a single-channel pipette. Each of these 24 wells will then be transferred to a clean 24-well plate. The compound source information and target locations are defined in a CSV file.
markdown.process:
1. Upload a CSV file containing information of compound source and target.
2. Download the protocol for the appropriate robot.
markdown.notes:
CSV files breakdown:
* Compound: name of compound
* Plate: the plate in which the compound is stored
* Well: the well of the plate in which the compound is stored
* A1, B1 ,,,, D6: volume of which the compound is to be transferred to each individual target well A1, B1 ,,,, D6
